akn:section.akn:heading: Abatement of real property taxes for National Public Radio, Inc.

akn:content.akn:p: The real property taxes to be imposed with respect to the real property identified in the tax records of the District of Columbia, as of the effective date of this section [August 29, 2008], as Square 673, Lot 837, and any improvements thereto, shall be abated in any amount in excess of the amount of the real property taxes imposed on the property for tax year 2008, but only until the 1st tax year beginning after the 20th anniversary of the issuance of the final certificate of occupancy for the headquarters building of National Public Radio, Inc., on such real property.
